#includeTopic("XWiki.XWikiCommonJavascript") 1 Welcome to the Class Editor This tools allows to work on the classes on your wiki. Before working on the classes, you should read the FAQ entry [What is a Class>http://www.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/view/Doc/WhatIsAClass] #if(($xwiki.hasAdminRights())&&($context.database.equals("xwiki"))) 1.1 Models Here are the templates and sheets for creating new classes. * [ClassSheet] * [ClassTemplate] * [ClassItemSheet] * [ClassItemTemplate] #end 1.1 Create a new Class To create a new class you must first choose the name of your class and click on the button "Create this Class". This will automatically create a document for you class and redirect you to this document where you will be able to follow the instructions to make your class usable. Choose a simple name like 'Film', 'Book', 'Article'. XWiki will happend 'Class' at the end automatically.
